page.title: 06Employment in South Brent(2)
page.content:
As the list on the previous page shows,most employment opportunities in S.Brent are in small shops and food stores. There are not many factories, so there are not many jobs available in S.Brent as compared with other towns and villages. If you want a job it is likely that you will have to work in another town.
{Workplaces of South Brent men:
Plymouth 31% South Brent 21%{ Working Totnes 11%{ mothers: Ivybridge 6% 54% of mothers Moorhaven Hospital 4% in S.Brent are Exeter 1% at work. Abroad 8% Other places in UK 18%
